subject: Re: [junit] Re: Any plans to revamp junit?
msgSnippet: ... Indeed, perhaps the authors should open up the repository for contributions by the open source community. Kind regards, Sven =====
messageBody:
--- Bill_de_hï¿½ra <dehora@...> wrote:
>
> It's not about that, it's about who has commit
> access. Junit 3.8,1
> was release in Sept 2002. As such it looks like a
> dead/abandoned
> project to me. No doubt forking to get to Junit 4
> has crossed some
> peoples minds.
>

Indeed, perhaps the authors should open up the
repository for contributions by the open source
community.

Kind regards,
Sven
